data.text:
Leo Z. Penn

Born 27 Aug 1921 in Lawrence, Essex, Massachusetts, United States

Ancestors

[sibling(s) unknown]

Husband of Olive Corn — married 19 Feb 1947 (to 1952) in Los Angeles, Los Angeles, California, United States

Husband of Eileen (Annucci) Penn — married 1958 in New York City, New York, United States

Father of Sean Penn and Christopher Shannon Penn

Died 5 Sep 1998 at age 77 in Santa Monica, Los Angeles, California, United States

Problems/Questions

Profile last modified 17 May 2024 | Created 11 Oct 2022

This page has been accessed 365 times.

Biography

Leo Penn is Notable.

Leonard Francis Penn (August 27, 1921 – September 5, 1998) was an American actor and director and the father of musician Michael Penn and actors Sean Penn and Chris Penn.

His first marriage, to Olive Deering, was dissolved in 1952. He was married in 1957 to actress Eileen Ryan, with whom he had three sons: singer Michael Penn, and actors Sean Penn and Chris Penn. His granddaughter (his son Sean's daughter) is actress Dylan Penn.

Leo Penn died of lung cancer in Santa Monica, California, on September 5, 1998, at the age of 77, and was interred at the Holy Cross Cemetery in Culver City, California.
